name: user_follower
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_scraper_v2.
Tool description: Get basic tiktok user info and medias. Cheap and stable. Telegram https://t.me/JoTucker2022
API description: Retrieves the followers of a specified TikTok user using the provided API key.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the TikTok user whose followers are to be retrieved.

count.description: The number of followers to retrieve. Default is None.

cursor.description: The cursor for pagination (to fetch the next set of followers). Default is None.
